ERROR_GOOGLE_LOGIN: An error occurred while authenticating with Google
ERROR_USERNAME_O_EMAIL_DUPLICADO: The email or user is already registered
ERROR_CONTRASENIA_ACTUAL_INCORRECTA: The current password entered is not correct
NO_FILES_SELECTED: You must select at least one file
ERROR_USUARIO_INEXISTENTE: The user with the data entered has not been found.
ERROR_GENERAL: The operation could not be performed. Please try again.
CAMBIO_CLAVE_EXITO: Your password has been successfully updated.
ERROR_420: Retry again in a few seconds
ERROR_MAIL_NO_VALIDADO: You must validate your email before entering. Check your email box.
RECOVERY_PASSWORD: You have been sent an email with the steps to follow to reset your password
ERROR_LIMITE_TMP_UPLOADS_MENSUAL_ALCANZA: You have exceeded the monthly upload limit. Contact us for more information.
ENLACE_RESTAURAR_CLAVE_EXPIRADO: The code to restore the password has expired. You must perform the restore flow again.
ASUNTO_MENSAJE_OBLIGATORIO: The subject and message is mandatory
USUARIO_REGISTRADO: User successfully registered. An email has been sent to validate your username.
ERROR_EMAIL_DUPLICADO: A user with the same email already exists
LOGIN_REINTENTAR: Please retry again in a few seconds
DOMINIO_YA_SELECCIONADO: You are already working in this domain
ERROR_CODIGO_O_NOMBRE_DUPLICADOS: The Code field and the Country field cannot be repeated.
ERROR_OPTIMISTIC_LOCK: The object you want to save has been modified by another user. You must reload it and try again.
